code: @Override public MetadataReader getMetadataReader(Resource resource) throws IOException {     MetadataReader metadataReader = this.cache.get(resource).     if (metadataReader == null) {         metadataReader = createMetadataReader(resource).         this.cache.put(resource, metadataReader).     }     return metadataReader. }

comment: /**  * Create the meta-data reader.  * @param resource the source resource.  * @return the meta-data reader  * @throws IOException on error  */
code: /**  * Create the meta-data reader.  * @param resource the source resource.  * @return the meta-data reader  * @throws IOException on error  */ protected MetadataReader createMetadataReader(Resource resource) throws IOException {     return super.getMetadataReader(resource). }

comment: /**  * Clear the entire MetadataReader cache, removing all cached class metadata.  */
code: /**  * Clear the entire MetadataReader cache, removing all cached class metadata.  */ public void clearCache() {     this.cache.clear(). }
